lessonTopics: Lesson 1: Nurse Coach Foundation - What nurse coaching is, how it differs from clinical nursing, the nursing advantage in coaching, scope of practice for nurse coaches
Lesson 2: The H.E.A.L.T.H. Method - Hear, Explore, Assess, Leverage, Transform, Habit framework for systematic nurse coaching practice
Lesson 3: Getting Your First Coaching Clients - Leveraging nursing networks, pricing packages, income math, 30-day launch plan for nurse coaches
painPoints: Compassion fatigue and emotional exhaustion from years of bedside care
Moral injury from working in a broken healthcare system
Feeling trapped in nursing with no idea what else they could do
Physical breakdown from night shifts, 12-hour days, and constant stress
Wanting to help patients differently - more time, deeper connection, real transformation
Watching colleagues burn out and leave nursing entirely
Being the one everyone comes to for advice but having no framework or income for it
Knowing something has to change before they end up on disability or worse
terminology: Board-Certified Nurse Coach (NC-BC) - credential from AHNCC demonstrating competence in nurse coaching
Holistic nursing - treating the whole person, not just symptoms, integrating mind-body-spirit
H.E.A.L.T.H. Method - Hear, Explore, Assess, Leverage, Transform, Habit framework for coaching sessions
Compassion fatigue - emotional and physical exhaustion from caring for others at expense of self
Moral injury - psychological distress from actions or lack of actions that violate moral code
Wellness advocacy - empowering clients to take active role in their own health and wellbeing
Nurse entrepreneurship - using nursing skills to build independent coaching or consulting practice
Burnout recovery - process of restoring depleted physical, emotional, and spiritual resources
Clinical background leverage - using nursing assessment skills, medical knowledge in coaching context
Scope of practice - clear boundaries between nurse coaching and clinical nursing care
clientExamples: Nurses experiencing burnout who need support transitioning to less stressful roles
Healthcare workers dealing with compassion fatigue seeking work-life balance
Physicians and NPs looking for career pivot guidance from someone who understands medicine
Former nurses wanting to return to healthcare in a different capacity
New nurses overwhelmed by the reality of bedside care
Hospital administrators wanting wellness programs for their staff
practiceType: Nurse wellness coaching focused on burnout prevention, career transitions, work-life balance, and leveraging clinical skills for entrepreneurship and alternative nursing roles
